title: About Two Stats Bot
description:
Two Stats Bot is an exercise in making tabletop adventure game bots that use tracery for discord bots. Tracery is by Kate Compton.```Please give Two Stats Bot permission to manage messages in whichever channel you want it to live; this allows it to delete command messages and keep the log clear!```For help and other information, I can be reached on twitter: @negative_cone
ty, lyu
-cecil

fields.name: ``+help``
fields.value: See this message again for some reason. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
